original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3426)@</color>蓄力射出一發燃燒著火焰的箭矢，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3426)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3426)@</color> shoot an arrow burning with flames to <color=#ccffcc> $Skill_Str(3426)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage to the enemy.
